left-block-main-screen.text: With 5 years of hands-on enduro experience, we‚Äôll help you unlock the power of the mountains and the freedom of true off-road riding.

advantages.title-1-block: Customized Adventures for Every Skill Level
advantages.title-3-block: We Focus on Comfort and Experience
advantages.description-1-block: Each ride is tailored to you ‚Äî from easy scenic trails to challenging pro-level routes.
advantages.description-2-block: Pricing includes full gear: helmet, boots, protective suit ‚Äî everything you need to ride safely.
advantages.description-3-block: Just bring a change of clothes. We‚Äôll take care of the rest: showers, parking, GoPro footage, coffee & snacks.

location.text: Our base is surrounded by six 2000m+ peaks. Reaching the foot of any of them takes just about 1.5 hours.

walk.title: CARPATHIAN NATURE WALK
walk.description: Relaxed ride through serene trails and meadows ‚Äî the ideal way to connect with nature and gain basic off-road skills.

panoramas.title: THRILLING PANORAMAS
panoramas.description: Ride through scenic ridgelines, stream crossings, and uphill trails with panoramic views and a dose of adrenaline.

brave.title: TRAIL OF THE BRAVE
points: Hidden Hutsul trails and guide-only paths
brave.description: Ready for a real challenge? Ride deep into the wild Carpathians with steep climbs, rocky paths, and wild beauty.

extreme.title: CARPATHIAN EXTREME RIDE
points: Routes only the toughest can conquer
